name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $target
desc: Returns: A resource that was validated.

name: $addtarget
desc: A resource that was validated.

name: $targetLocation
desc: Returns: The fhirpath location(s) within the resource that was validated.

name: $addtargetLocation
desc: The fhirpath location(s) within the resource that was validated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The fhirpath location(s) within the resource that was validated.

name: $need
desc: Returns: The frequency with which the target must be validated (none; initial; periodic).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The frequency with which the target must be validated (none; initial; periodic).

name: $status
desc: Returns: The validation status of the target (attested; validated; in process; requires revalidation; validation failed; revalidation failed).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The validation status of the target (attested; validated; in process; requires revalidation; validation failed; revalidation failed).

name: $statusDate
desc: Returns: When the validation status was updated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When the validation status was updated.

name: $validationType
desc: Returns: What the target is validated against (nothing; primary source; multiple sources).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: What the target is validated against (nothing; primary source; multiple sources).

name: $validationProcess
desc: Returns: The primary process by which the target is validated (edit check; value set; primary source; multiple sources; standalone; in context).

name: $addvalidationProcess
desc: The primary process by which the target is validated (edit check; value set; primary source; multiple sources; standalone; in context).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The primary process by which the target is validated (edit check; value set; primary source; multiple sources; standalone; in context).

name: $frequency
desc: Returns: Frequency of revalidation.

name: $lastPerformed
desc: Returns: The date/time validation was last completed (including failed validations).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date/time validation was last completed (including failed validations).

name: $nextScheduled
desc: Returns: The date when target is next validated, if appropriate.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date when target is next validated, if appropriate.

name: $failureAction
desc: Returns: The result if validation fails (fatal; warning; record only; none).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The result if validation fails (fatal; warning; record only; none).

name: $primarySource
desc: Returns: Information about the primary source(s) involved in validation.

name: $addprimarySource
desc: Information about the primary source(s) involved in validation.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Information about the primary source(s) involved in validation.

name: $attestation
desc: Returns: Information about the entity attesting to information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information about the entity attesting to information.

name: $validator
desc: Returns: Information about the entity validating information.

name: $addvalidator
desc: Information about the entity validating information.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Information about the entity validating information.
